project.welcome: Welcome To The Prehistoric Adventures of Cookie Man!
project.author: Firelord Quality Games

object.name: Cave_CutScene_1
object.description: You discover a strange inscription in small caveman fonts...It is written in an unknown language... ''
object.initialdescription: 'The sacred book will lead to a sacred artifact which will lead to the Ultimate Scroll!'

nogo.out: I don't know which way that is.

object.name: Cave_CutScene_2
object.description: After many many years... A man named Dr Robbie Pssst explores a garden near a cave and discovers Cookie Man drawings! Some years later Dr Robbie Pssst lives in a haunted mansion with an amazing ten level garden where he does his research...

nogo.out: I don't know which way that is.

object.name: Cave_CutScene_3
object.description: You hear buggy music and pssssst sounds in in Dolby 9.3 surround system! ... pssssssssst psssst pssssst...Get ready for 'The REAL adventures of Doctor Pssst!' ....pssssssssst psssst pssssst ---THE END?---

object.name: Entrance
object.description: You are at the entrance of a cave. In this cave your tribe keeps all the food/meal ingredients. In the north you see the Tomatoes Storage cave.

routines.routine: //put any startup code or messages here
//put reset code here
if (dobj == player) { println("Not physically possible."); }
if (dobj.portable == 1) { if (dobj.holder != player) { println("(Taken)"); dobj.holder = player;} }
println("If you are experiencing suicidal thoughts you should seek psychiatric help.");
println("Perhaps you should count to 3 and calm down.");
println("***YOU HAVE DIED***."); reset();
println("Talking to yourself is a sign of impending mental collapse.");
println("That fails to produce an exciting conversation.");
println("You hear nothing unexpected.");
println("You smell nothing unexpected.");
println("Time passes...");
println("AAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRGGGGGG!");
println("WHEEEEEE!");
println("That's not part of a healthy diet.");
println("You can't drink that.");
println("[Note: you can't quit the test client]");
println("Taken.");
println("Dropped.");
println("Closed.");

events.event: if(ant.location==player.location) println("You see Ant in the cave! bad ant ") ;
if(plateosaurus.location==player.location) println("You see Plateosaurus in the cave! You are still in the start... Maybe you should kill it using a useless item.! ") ;
if(allosaurus.location==player.location) println("You see Allosaurus in the cave! You might want to attack from a distance! ") ;
if(apatosaurus.location==player.location) println("You see Apatosaurus in the cave! He is covered with vegetable leftovers ") ;
if(barosaurus.location==player.location) println("You see Barosaurus in the cave! Hack and smash time! ") ;
if(camarasaurus.location==player.location) println("You see Camarasaurus in the cave! His belly is full. He think you are the dessert ") ;
if(camptosaurus.location==player.location) println("You see Camptosaurus in the cave! This might need a short-cut ") ;
if(mamenchisaurus.location==player.location) println("You see Mamenchisaurus in the cave! He thinks you're dinner ") ;
if(stegosaurus.location==player.location) println("You see Stegosaurus in the cave! His armour looks like an Oyster armour ") ;
if(albertosaurus.location==player.location) println("You see Albertosaurus in the cave! Tasty! ") ;
if(tyrannosaurus_rex.location==player.location) println("You see Tyrannosaurus Rex in the cave! You will need brute force to kill this huge beast! ") ;

project.walkthrough: kill ant with leaf,n,kill plateosaurus with spatula,n,kill allosaurus with woodden stick,n,kill apatosaurus with salad fork,n,kill barosaurus with stone axe,n,kill camarasaurus with dessert fork,n,kill Camptosaurus with rock knife,n,kill Mamenchisaurus with Dinner Fork,n,kill Stegosaurus with oyster fork,n,kill Albertosaurus with teeth,n,kill rex with club,n,
project.test1: put Apple inside pot, put Bacon inside pot, put Bean inside pot, put Cucumber inside pot, put Feta cheese inside pot, put Lemon inside pot, put Onion inside pot, put Potato inside pot, put Tomato inside pot, put Watermelon inside pot, put Yogurt inside pot
